title: Shambhala Finance
about-content: Shambhala Finance is a decentralized platform that allows users to earn rewards by providing liquidity to the market. Users can earn rewards by staking their assets in the liquidity pool and participating in the governance of the platform.
faq-content: Shambhala Finance is a decentralized platform that allows users to earn rewards by providing liquidity to the market. Users can earn rewards by staking their assets in the liquidity pool and participating in the governance of the platform.
ave: What's Aave? How does it work?
ave-content: Aave is a decentralized lending platform that allows users to borrow and lend assets without the need for a centralized intermediary. Users can earn interest on their assets by lending them to the platform, and borrow assets by providing collateral. The platform uses smart contracts to automate the lending and borrowing process, and ensures that users can access their assets at any time.

terms-acceptance-content: By accessing and using the DeFi Subscription Platform, you agree to these Terms of Use and any amendments made to them. If you do not agree to these Terms of Use, you should not use the Platform.
terms-services-content: The Platform provides a decentralized finance service. These include access to DeFi protocols and smart contracts, staking and yield farming, lending and borrowing, token swaps, and market data.

privacy-intro-content: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, store, use, and disclose your information when you use our DeFi Platform ("the Platform").
privacy-collect-content: We may collect the following types of information: Personal Information, Transactional Information, Technical Data.
privacy-use-content: We may use your information for the following purposes: to provide, maintain, and improve the Platform, to process transactions, to verify your identity, and to comply with legal obligations.
privacy-disclosure-content: We may share your information with third parties in certain circumstances: with your consent, with affiliates, or as required by law.
privacy-security-content: We implement security measures designed to protect your information from unauthorized access. However, we cannot guarantee the security of your information.
privacy-rights-content: Under the Act on the Protection of Personal Information (APPI), you have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal data.
privacy-changes-content: We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy.
privacy-contact-content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: [insert contact information].
